snippet: Katie Bam scored two goals, giving her five in two games, as the Americans beat India, 3-0, and stayed tied atop their group at the Olympics....
lead_paragraph: Katie Bam scored two goals, giving her five in two games, as the Americans beat India, 3-0, and stayed tied atop their group at the Olympics.

headline.main: U.S. Wins 4th Straight in Women’s Field Hockey, Setting Up Showdown With Britain
